name: goose
actor_no_arg: You reach your hand out, waiting for someone to back up into it.
others_no_arg: $n holds his hand out, searching for someone to goose.
actor_found_target: You tenderly goose $N on the tush.
others_found: $n reaches around $N's backside and gooses $M tenderly.
actor_auto: You should go hunting for another victim, they left.
